description: Learning Chinese is really tough but meanwhile very interesting. We try to make it in a fun and easy-to-follow way.  5 minutes for each episode will teach you some short but useful  Chinese sentences that you can use in daily life. The host Michale is a native Chinese speaker with a great sense of humor.  Go and follow him. Hope you'll enjoy the course. <br style=""><br style="">
title: Learn Oral Chinese with Jijizhazha Chinese
